en.ass_warning: Connecting network or subnet for the Cloud VM is up to a maximum of 3. Adding more than one network may lead to routing problems which will cause poor external networks connetions, please proceed with caution. Read here to learn more.
en.ip_info: System will auto assign if not filled.

zh-CN.ass_warning: 一台云主机最多只允许加入3个网络或者子网。加入多个网络可能会引发云主机路由问题而导致连不上外网，请谨慎操作。阅读这里了解详情。
zh-CN.detach_instance: 该操作将此虚拟网卡从云主机上卸载
zh-CN.ip_info: 如不填系统会自动分配
